creator: kankintojas
title: Arduino Pro Mini Morse Decoder With 7-Segment Indicator - Beginner Project
description: This project is a simple Morse code decoder using an Arduino Pro Mini that displays decoded letters on a 7-segment display. It's designed for beginners and combines elements from the "Arduino Morse Code Machine" and "Alphabetic Character display on 7 Segment LED using Arduino" projects.
steps: Gather all the required parts: Arduino Pro Mini, Programmer, Breadboard, 8x 150 ohm resistors, 7-segment indicator SC08-11EWA, Button, 2x LEDs, and Wires.
Connect the components according to the schema. Specifically, connect the Dot LED to pin 10, the Dash LED to pin 11, and the Buzzer to pin 14.
Upload the provided code to the Arduino Pro Mini. Define pins and the pause_value within the code.
Press the button briefly to activate the dot LED. Press and hold the button longer to activate the dash LED.
Combine dots and dashes to represent letters or numbers, which will then be displayed on the 7-segment display.
